### Teosinte:

- 1000,000 runs
```{r, eval=FALSE}
# devtools::install_github("yangjl/huskeR")
library("huskeR")

# control file
files <- list.files(path="cache/mcmc_revise", pattern="new_msfs", full.names=TRUE)
# Ne = 50,000, 100,000, 500,000, and 1,000,000
# rep = 10 each
df <- data.frame(file=rep(files, each=40), ne=rep(c(50000, 100000, 500000, 1000000), each=10), rep=1:10)
df$out <- paste0(gsub(".csv", "", df$file), "_", df$ne, "_", df$rep, ".RData")
write.table(df, "slurm-script/slurm_ne_parameters.csv", sep=",", row.names=FALSE)



## run code
run_Rcode(inputdf=data.frame(file=1:80, out=1), outdir="slurm-script", cmdno=1,
           rcodes = "profiling/3.popgen/3.D.1_setup_MCMC_ne.R",
            rversion = "3.5",
           base_shid ="ne_msfs",
           email="yangjl0930@gmail.com", runinfo = c(TRUE, "jyanglab", 1, "4G", "48:00:00"))

```
